revised_title: Symposium on Biochemistry and Nutrition: Celebrating the Centenary of Sir Frederick Gowland Hopkins
tldr: This symposium celebrates the centenary of Sir Frederick Gowland Hopkins, a pioneer in modern biochemistry. The meeting discusses various aspects of biochemistry and nutrition, including pterins, vitamins, proteins, and lipids. Hopkins' contributions to the field, such as his research on vitamins and enzymes, are highlighted, emphasizing his deep intuition and creativity in understanding the living cell.
